title: Wallkill man, two children dead in murder-suicide
content:
WALLKILL – Authorities are investigating a murder-suicide that occurred at a mobile home park on Fifth Avenue in the Town of Wallkill in Orange County, according to state police.
Police discovered one man and two children dead inside the residence following a call for an unresponsive man.
Police said the man, John Casulo, 48, was found with a single gunshot wound to the head. Also found inside the home was an 8-year-old James Casulo and 12-year-old Kathleen Casulo, both dead from a single gunshot wound to the head.
The police investigation revealed Casullo used a .45 caliber pistol to murder each his children while they slept in their bedroom before turning the weapon on himself.
No one else was at the residence during the time of the incident, police said.
State police are being assisted by the Town of Wallkill Police Department.
